author: GameSpot
description:
Check out over 10 minutes of Yakuza Kiwami 3 gameplay right off the announcement from RGG Studios on Tuesday. We get a look at a variety of gameplay including combat, karaoke mini game, eating a meal, changing our outfit, and a cutscene.

Timestamps: 
0:00 Intro
0:08 First Fight
0:57 Second Fight
2:01 Buying Snacks at the Convenience Store
2:23 Karaoke 
4:57 Buying and Eating Lunch
5:39 Changing Outfit
7:11 Story Cutscene

#yakuza  #kiwami3 #gaming
title: 10 Minutes of Yakuza Kiwami 3 Gameplay | TGS 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Check out 9 minutes of Yakuza 3 Gaiden: Dark Ties which is a spin-off coming with Yakuza Kiwami 3 that features Mine as the protagonist of the story. Watch as we tail Tsuyoshi Kanda a Nishikiyama Family Soldier. Along the way we take on Thugs, Yakuza, and even stop by the print club to take some photos.

Timestamps: 
0:00 Intro
0:52 Club Sega
1:09 Taking pictures
1:55 Second Fight
2:37 Fighting Yakuza
3:05 Tailing Tsuyoshi Kanda

#yakuza  #kiwami3 #gaming
title: 9 Minutes of Yakuza 3 Gaiden: Dark Ties Gameplay | TGS 2025

author: GameSpot
description: Konami sent us a real puzzle box inspired by a puzzle in Silent Hill f. Let's see how Kurt handles it.
title: Solving This REAL Silent Hill f Puzzle Box

author: GameSpot
description: Ghost of Yotei is shaped by Atsu, its new protagonist, as you're propelled on a gripping tale of revenge amidst the backdrop of Feudal Japan's contrasting beauty and violence.
title: Ghost of Yōtei Review

author: GameSpot
description:
Forza Horizon 6 has been announced and will launch first on Xbox Series X|S consoles and PC in 2026. Discover the breathtaking landscapes of Japan and become a racing Legend at the Horizon Festival.

#forzahorizon6 #xbox #gaming
title: Forza Horizon 6 - Official Announcement Teaser Trailer | TGS 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Team NINJA and PlatinumGames unveiled a first look at the difficulty design in NINJA GAIDEN 4, showcasing dynamic enemy placement and aggressive AI that scale with difficulty levels. 

The game stays true to its punishing roots, while introducing a new hero mode and adjustable assists that can ease newcomers into its signature high-speed combat. A stand-alone training mode—a first in the series—lets players sharpen their skills before diving into battle.

Intro 0:00
Hero Mode 1:01
Master Ninja Level gameplay at 2:44.
title: NINJA GAIDEN 4 - Gameplay Overview Trailer | TGS 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
Gunslingers!! GUNGRAVE GORE BLOOD HEAT is the fully rebuilt version of GUNGRAVE GORE, featuring a modernized system with a new engine and enhanced visual quality. 

New systems, more refined Characters and Background visuals, the return of heritage, exclusive characters, and more—get ready for the completely transformed GUNGRAVE GORE BLOOD HEAT!!
title: Gungrave GORE Blood Heat – Official Announcement Trailer | TGS 2025

author: GameSpot
description:
We got a chance to check out the Monster Hunter Wilds x Final Fantasy XIV Update 3 collaboration. Watch a hunt against Omega Planetes the new monster being added as part of the collaboration. In this clip we use the Bow as our primary weapon. Enjoy the update coming out September 29th.

#gamespot #gaming
title: Monster Hunter Wilds x Final Fantasy XIV Omega Planetes Gameplay

author: GameSpot
description:
We recently went to Capcom to get hands-on for the first time with Monster Hunter Stories 3: twisted reflection. it’s an early mission where you play as a ranger,  forming bonds with your monsties, getting to grips with traversal, and of course, taking a stab at some turn based combat.

This is an in-development build and we captured this footage on PS5. the game releases on March 13, 2026.

Credits: max blumenthal, lucy james

#gamespot #gaming
title: Monster Hunters Stories 3: Twisted Reflection Gameplay

author: GameSpot
description: The company going belly up immediately after reporting in for duty. Blowing up on the internet after dealing with a Maniac Chaos causing a traffic jam. Needless to say, upon arriving in Nova City, the new captain has to deal with his fair share of headaches. To top it all off, he's utterly unfamiliar with his new home. Only one thing is for certain: there are some tough days ahead.
title: Ananta | Gameplay Trailer

author: GameSpot
description: We got a 35 minute plus PlayStation State of Play today that showcased about 5 minutes of Saros Gameplay, as well as our very first look at Marvel's Wolverine gameplay. We even got a behind the scenes look and overview from the developers from Insomniac Games for Marvel's Wolverine. Additionally, we got a surprise hardware reveal with the new Sony Pulse Elevate Wireless Speakers. Tamoor breaks down what he saw and his thoughts on some of the big updates from the State of Play.
title: PlayStation State of Play Has Us Hyped for Marvel's Wolverine

author: GameSpot
description: The latest Zelda Musou spin-off is being canonized, which has opened the way for exciting new gameplay opportunities.
title: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment Is Adding A Lot More Depth To Combat

author: GameSpot
description:
Although we didn't get to see a lot of the game, here's a recap and reaction of what we saw in Marvel's Wolverine trailer.

title: Marvel's Wolverine: Here's What We Think of The Trailer

description:
